valueSet.name: ATVPRST_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvprst_code, atvprst_desc, to_char(atvprst_activity_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) act_date, atvprst_active_ind FROM atvprst WHERE (atvprst_pros_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMRINFO.AMRINFO_STATUS') OR (atvprst_pros_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AUBINST.AUBINST_DFLT_PRST_CODE') OR (atvprst_proj_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMRPRIN.AMRPRIN_PRST_CODE') OR (atvprst_proj_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMRPROP.AMRPROP_PRST_CODE') OR (atvprst_prop_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMBPROP.AMBPROP_PRST_CODE') OR (atvprst_prop_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMBPRPH.AMBPRPH_PRST_CODE') OR (atvprst_proj_ind = '1' AND :SYSTEM_CURSOR_ITEM = 'AMRPRPH.AMRPRPH_PRST_CODE') ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: AGBPLDG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT agbpldg_pledge_no, to_char(agbpldg_pledge_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) pdate, agbpldg_pcat_code, atvpcat_desc FROM agbpldg, atvpcat WHERE agbpldg_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK_PIDM AND agbpldg_pcat_code = atvpcat_code ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: ADBDESG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT adbdesg_desg, adbdesg_name, adbdesg_dsta_code, adbdesg_dstp_code, adbdesg_restr_ind, adbdesg_coll_code FROM adbdesg ORDER BY adbdesg_desg

valueSet.name: AFBCAMP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT afbcamp_campaign, afbcamp_name FROM afbcamp ORDER BY afbcamp_campaign

valueSet.name: AFRCORG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT afrcorg_sol_org, asbsorg_name, afrcorg_goal FROM afrcorg, asbsorg WHERE ((afrcorg_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcorg_solc_code = :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE AND :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE IS NOT NULL) OR (afrcorg_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE IS NULL AND afrcorg_solc_code IS NULL)) AND asbsorg_sol_org = afrcorg_sol_org

valueSet.name: AFRCSLT_RG_OLD
valueSet.query: SELECT spriden_id, spriden_last_name, spriden_first_name, spriden_mi FROM afrcslt, spriden WHERE ((afrcslt_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcslt_solc_code = :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE AND afrcslt_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION) OR (afrcslt_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcslt_solc_code = :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE AND afrcslt_sol_org IS NULL AND :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION IS NULL) OR (afrcslt_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcslt_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND afrcslt_solc_code IS NULL AND :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE IS NULL) OR (afrcslt_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcslt_solc_code IS NULL AND :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE IS NULL AND afrcslt_sol_org IS NULL AND :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION IS NULL)) AND spriden_pidm = afrcslt_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL

valueSet.name: AFRCSLT_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT DISTINCT (spriden_id), decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(spriden_mi, '', '', spriden_mi) FROM spriden, afrcslt WHERE spriden_pidm = afrcslt_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL AND nvl(afrcslt_campaign, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN, '~') AND nvl(afrcslt_solc_code, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE, '~') AND nvl(afrcslt_sol_org, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION, '~')

valueSet.name: AFRCSOL_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT afrcsol_solc_code, atvsolc_desc FROM afrcsol, atvsolc WHERE afrcsol_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND afrcsol_solc_code IS NOT NULL AND afrcsol_solc_code = atvsolc_code

valueSet.name: AFRCTYP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT afrctyp_campaign, afrctyp_solc_code, afrctyp_sol_org, afrctyp_dcyr_code, (x.spriden_last_name || decode(x.spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || x.spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(x.spriden_mi, '', '', x.spriden_mi)), x.spriden_id, afrctyp_constituent_pidm, (y.spriden_last_name || decode(y.spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || y.spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(y.spriden_mi, '', '', y.spriden_mi)), y.spriden_id, afrctyp_seq_no FROM afrctyp, spriden x, spriden y WHERE (afrctyp_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN OR afrctyp_campaign IS NULL) AND (afrctyp_constituent_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK_PIDM OR afrctyp_constituent_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK_SPS_PIDM) AND (afrctyp_pidm = x.spriden_pidm AND x.spriden_change_ind IS NULL) AND (y.spriden_pidm = afrctyp_constituent_pidm AND y.spriden_change_ind IS NULL) ORDER BY afrctyp_dcyr_code DESC

valueSet.name: AMBPROP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT ambprop_prop_code, ambprop_prop_seq_no, atvprop_desc, ambprop_ask_amount, to_char(ambprop_due_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) due_date, ambprop_prst_code FROM ambprop, atvprop WHERE ambprop_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK_PIDM AND ambprop_prop_code = atvprop_code ORDER BY ambprop_due_date, ambprop_prop_code, ambprop_prop_seq_no

valueSet.name: APRCATG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT aprcatg_donr_code, atvdonr_desc FROM aprcatg, atvdonr WHERE aprcatg_pidm = :PIDM AND aprcatg_donr_code = atvdonr_code ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: APRCATG_SPS_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT aprcatg_donr_code, atvdonr_desc FROM aprcatg, atvdonr WHERE aprcatg_pidm = :SPS_PIDM AND aprcatg_donr_code = atvdonr_code ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: APRDHIS_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT UNIQUE aprdhis_desg, adbdesg_name FROM aprdhis, adbdesg WHERE aprdhis_pidm = :KEY_BLOCK_PIDM AND aprdhis_desg = adbdesg_desg

valueSet.name: ASCCSLT_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT spriden_id, decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(spriden_mi, '', '', spriden_mi || ' ') || decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name name FROM spriden, asrsorg WHERE spriden_pidm = asrsorg_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL AND asrsorg_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION

valueSet.name: ASCSORG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT asbsorg_sol_org, asbsorg_name, asbsorg_sotp_code FROM asbsorg

valueSet.name: ASRSOAG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT asrsoag_dcyr_code, atvdcyr_desc FROM asrsoag, atvdcyr WHERE asrsoag_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND atvdcyr_code = asrsoag_dcyr_code ORDER BY asrsoag_dcyr_code DESC

valueSet.name: ASRSORG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT spriden_id, spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_mi) FROM spriden, asrsorg WHERE asrsorg_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND spriden_pidm = asrsorg_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL ORDER BY spriden_last_name

valueSet.name: ASRSSAG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT spriden_id, decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_mi) FROM spriden, asrssag WHERE asrssag_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND asrssag_dcyr_code = :GLOBAL_DCYR_CODE AND spriden_pidm = asrssag_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL ORDER BY decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name

valueSet.name: GTVNTYP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT gtvntyp_code, gtvntyp_desc, to_char(gtvntyp_activity_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) act_date FROM gtvntyp ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: TYPE_ORG_SOL_4_CAMP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT afrcslt_solc_code, afrcslt_sol_org, (decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(spriden_mi, '', '', spriden_mi)), spriden_id, spriden_surname_prefix, spriden_last_name FROM afrcslt, spriden WHERE afrcslt_campaign = :GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN AND ((afrcslt_solc_code = :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE) OR :GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE IS NULL) AND ((afrcslt_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION) OR :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION IS NULL) AND (afrcslt_pidm = spriden_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL) ORDER BY decode(afrcslt_solc_code, '', '*', afrcslt_solc_code) ASC, decode(afrcslt_sol_org, '', '*', afrcslt_sol_org) ASC, decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name ASC

valueSet.name: YEAR_SOL_4_ORG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT asrssag_dcyr_code, spriden_id, decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ' || spriden_mi), spriden_surname_prefix, spriden_last_name FROM spriden, asrssag WHERE asrssag_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND ((asrssag_dcyr_code = :GLOBAL_DCYR_CODE) OR :GLOBAL_DCYR_CODE IS NULL) AND spriden_pidm = asrssag_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL ORDER BY asrssag_dcyr_code DESC, decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name ASC

valueSet.name: CAMP_ORG_SOL_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT DISTINCT (spriden_id), decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(spriden_mi, '', '', spriden_mi) FROM spriden, afrctyp WHERE spriden_pidm = afrctyp_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL AND nvl(afrctyp_campaign, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_CAMPAIGN, '~') AND nvl(afrctyp_solc_code, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_SOLICITATION_TYPE, '~') AND nvl(afrctyp_sol_org, '~') = nvl(:GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION, '~')

valueSet.name: ORG_YR_SOL_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT DISTINCT (spriden_id), decode(spriden_surname_prefix, '', '', spriden_surname_prefix || ' ') || spriden_last_name || decode(spriden_first_name, '', '', ', ' || spriden_first_name || ' ') || decode(spriden_mi, '', '', spriden_mi) FROM spriden, afrctyp WHERE spriden_pidm = afrctyp_pidm AND spriden_change_ind IS NULL AND afrctyp_sol_org = :GLOBAL_ORGANIZATION AND afrctyp_dcyr_code = :GLOBAL_DCYR_CODE

valueSet.name: POP_SEL_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT glvslct_application, glvslct_selection, glvslct_creator_id FROM glvslct WHERE (glvslct_application = :GLOBAL_APPL_CODE AND :GLOBAL_APPL_CODE IS NOT NULL) OR :GLOBAL_APPL_CODE IS NULL

valueSet.name: ATVDNAM_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvdnam_code, atvdnam_desc, to_char(atvdnam_activity_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) act_date FROM atvdnam ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: AGBPDEF_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT agbpdef_dnam_code, atvdnam_desc, to_char(agbpdef_activity_date, G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT) act_date FROM agbpdef, atvdnam WHERE agbpdef_user = :CURRENT_USER AND agbpdef_dnam_code = atvdnam_code ORDER BY 1

valueSet.name: ATVCCLS_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvccls_code, atvccls_desc FROM atvccls

valueSet.name: ATVACAT_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvacat_code, atvacat_desc FROM atvacat ORDER BY atvacat_code

valueSet.name: ATVRCAT_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvrcat_code, atvrcat_desc FROM atvrcat ORDER BY atvrcat_code

valueSet.name: ATVALRT_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvalrt_code, atvalrt_desc FROM atvalrt WHERE (atvalrt_super_ind = '0' OR (atvalrt_super_ind = '1' AND (user) IN ((SELECT aabctrl_super_id FROM aabctrl WHERE aabctrl_super_id = user )))) ORDER BY atvalrt_code

valueSet.name: ATVADTL_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvadtl_code, atvadtl_desc, atvadtl_activity_date FROM atvadtl ORDER BY atvadtl_code

valueSet.name: ATVSCTG_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvsctg_code, atvsctg_desc FROM atvsctg ORDER BY atvsctg_code

valueSet.name: ATVSGRP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvsgrp_code, atvsgrp_desc FROM atvsgrp ORDER BY atvsgrp_code

valueSet.name: ATVPFTP_RG
valueSet.query: SELECT atvpftp_code, atvpftp_desc FROM atvpftp
